# HttpContentSerializer.IsAcceptedMediaTypeCore method

Determines if the specified media type is accepted when investigating the Accept header.

```csharp
protected virtual bool IsAcceptedMediaTypeCore(string mediaType)
```

## Remarks

Calls [`IsSupportedMediaType`](IsSupportedMediaType.md) by default.
